source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT MAX(TrxnDate) AS SourceTbl_Max_Date FROM DBO.IfTable_source
SELECT MAX(TrxnDate) as DestTbl_Max_Date from DBO.IfTable_dest
SELECT ID AS CUSTID, NAME AS CUSTNAME FROM TBL_A

SELECT NAME, ADDRESS, CITY, COUNTRY FROM DBO.ADDRESS_COMMON
WHERE COUNTRY = 'INDIA'

SELECT * FROM DBO.ADDRESS_COMMON
WHERE COUNTRY NOT IN ('INDIA','USA')
